sentences.sContent: Wearing the hairpiece helped me realize the power of looks.
sentences.sContent_eng: Wearing the hairpiece helped me realize the power of looks.
sentences.sCn: 戴了假发，让我发现外表会起很大的作用。

sentences.sContent: Later, when I wore the hairpiece for a play I was in, some friends of mine didn’t recognize me on stage.
sentences.sContent_eng: Later, when I wore the hairpiece for a play I was in, some friends of mine didn’t recognize me on stage.
sentences.sCn: 后来，我又戴着假发去演了个戏剧，我的几个朋友甚至都认不出舞台上的是我。

sentences.sContent: If Musa survives the coming weeks, and purchases a convincing hairpiece, he’ll be well placed to contract himself out to wobbling despots across the region.
sentences.sContent_eng: If Musa survives the coming weeks, and purchases a convincing hairpiece, he’ll be well placed to contract himself out to wobbling despots across the region.
sentences.sCn: 如果穆萨能在未来的几个星期幸存下来，并购买一顶可以以假乱真的假发，以他的优势，在这个地区，胜任为摇摇欲坠的独裁者工作。

trans.tranOther: a piece of false hair that you wear on your head to make your own hair look thicker
